name: Windows XP Portfolio
description: Rishith Chintala's portfolio website designed as an authentic Windows XP experience

screenshots.label: Windows XP Desktop Experience

owner.name: Rishith Chintala
owner.title: Creative Portfolio
owner.description: Windows XP-style portfolio showcasing photography, 3D design, and 2D design work

categories.name: Photography
categories.description: Professional photography work spanning urban landscapes, portraits, abstracts, and street photography

categories.name: 3D Design
categories.description: 3D modeling, rendering, and visualization projects including architectural and product design

categories.name: 2D Design
categories.description: Graphic design, branding, illustration, and interface design projects

projects.title: Urban Landscapes
projects.description: A collection of urban landscape photography capturing the intersection of architecture and natural light in metropolitan environments.
projects.detailDescription: This photography series explores the dynamic relationship between built environments and natural elements. Shot during golden hour and blue hour, these images showcase how light transforms urban spaces into artistic compositions.

projects.title: Portrait Stories
projects.description: Documentary-style portraits capturing authentic moments and emotions of people from diverse backgrounds and cultures.
projects.detailDescription: Each portrait tells a unique story, captured in natural lighting with minimal post-processing to preserve authenticity. The series focuses on genuine expressions and the character that emerges through careful composition.

projects.title: Nature Abstracts
projects.description: Abstract compositions found in nature, focusing on patterns, textures, and colors that create compelling visual narratives.
projects.detailDescription: This collection transforms natural elements into abstract art through close-up photography and unique angles. Water reflections, leaf patterns, and rock formations become graphic elements in these compositions.

projects.title: Street Photography
projects.description: Candid moments captured in urban environments, documenting daily life and human interactions in public spaces.
projects.detailDescription: Street photography that captures the spontaneous beauty of everyday life. These images focus on decisive moments, interesting characters, and the poetry found in ordinary situations.

projects.title: Architectural Visualization
projects.description: Photorealistic architectural renderings showcasing modern residential and commercial building designs.
projects.detailDescription: These 3D visualizations bring architectural concepts to life with careful attention to lighting, materials, and environmental context. Each render demonstrates mastery of spatial design and photorealistic rendering techniques.

projects.title: Product Design
projects.description: Industrial design concepts rendered in 3D, featuring consumer electronics and furniture with detailed material studies.
projects.detailDescription: Product design portfolio showcasing the complete design process from concept sketches to final 3D renders. Focus on ergonomics, aesthetics, and manufacturability in consumer product design.

projects.title: Brand Identity
projects.description: Complete brand identity systems including logos, typography, color palettes, and brand guidelines for various clients.
projects.detailDescription: Comprehensive brand identity projects that establish strong visual foundations for businesses. Each project includes extensive research, concept development, and systematic application across multiple touchpoints.

projects.title: Digital Illustrations
projects.description: Original digital illustrations combining traditional art techniques with modern digital tools and workflows.
projects.detailDescription: A collection of digital artwork that bridges traditional illustration techniques with contemporary digital methods. These pieces explore character design, environmental art, and conceptual illustration.

projects.title: Print Design
projects.description: Editorial and print design projects including magazine layouts, book covers, and promotional materials.
projects.detailDescription: Print design work focusing on typography, layout, and visual hierarchy. Projects include magazine spreads, book design, posters, and packaging that demonstrate strong understanding of print production.

projects.title: UI/UX Design
projects.description: User interface and experience design for web and mobile applications, focusing on usability and visual appeal.
projects.detailDescription: Digital interface design that prioritizes user experience and accessibility. Projects include mobile apps, web interfaces, and design systems that demonstrate user-centered design principles.

features: Click-to-zoom image viewing with position-based zooming
Functional recycle bin with restore capabilities
Dark mode toggle via turn off button
Persistent window and icon position saving
Featured work as third tab within each portfolio
